title: PG&E, Apple, Bed Bath & Beyond: Stocks That Defined the Week
text:
Domino’s Pizza Inc.

The delivery battle between Domino’s Pizza and rivals is heating up. The pizza chain that helped popularize food delivery said Tuesday it expects sales growth over the next few years to be slower than expected due to competition from third-party delivery companies like Grubhub Inc. and DoorDash Inc. Domino’s has refrained from putting its food on outside delivery apps, while both Pizza Hut, owned by Yum Brands Inc., and Papa John’s International Inc. work with delivery companies in addition to their...
description: Here are seven major companies whose stocks moved on the week’s news
